item.description:
Here it is, guys, as discussed, our second meetup and first trip.  I set it up with lots of lead time, as we can get a group discount, with enough people.  Otherwise, cost is $20 each, each way for the train.  There are a variety of possibilities for activities once there.  These are mostly on Casco Bay, and weather dependent, so I suggest we not commit to train ride or activities until early that same week.

     First train leaves Boston at 9:05, Woburn at 9:23, and   arrives in Portland 11:40.  (I will board the train in Woburn, we'll hook up with the Boston crew onboard).  Last train back leaves Portland at 6:50, arrives in Woburn at 8:59, and Boston at 9:20.  Sign up, and let's make this trip a go.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Take The Train To Portland Maine
